channel.title: I need a belkin portfowarder
channel.description:
My friend needs help portfowarding his server if one of you belkin portfowarders can portfoward for him that would be great he has team viewer too already downloaded Below is his email address thats his windows live messenger account add him if you want to talk to him XD PLEASE HELP HIM!
tyler_hommie@hotmail.com

item.title: I need a belkin portfowarder
item.dc:creator: @imal33thaxu imal33thaxu
item.description:
@imal33thaxu wrote:

[quote=“gamerbug, post:4, topic:351383”]alright, for belkin routers, go to 192.168.2.1
then there, you click on the link DHCP Client List … it has a list of Computers connected to your router. find the computer that is yours… for instance there 3 on my router…

192.168.2.2 devin-PC 192.168.2.3 Owner-PC 192.168.2.4
my pc is devin-PC
another connected pc is Owner-PC and another one… my xbox. the server is going to be hosted on 192.168.2.2…
that is the Ip you will use in the Virtual servers tab I described earlier[/quote]

thanks dude Rep+ he even told me to rep thank you so much

I New at the forums i just joined buy how do i rep lol

Read full topic

item.title: I need a belkin portfowarder
item.dc:creator: @gamerbug gamerbug
item.description:
@gamerbug wrote:

alright, for belkin routers, go to 192.168.2.1
then there, you click on the link DHCP Client List … it has a list of Computers connected to your router. find the computer that is yours… for instance there 3 on my router…

192.168.2.2 devin-PC 192.168.2.3 Owner-PC 192.168.2.4
my pc is devin-PC
another connected pc is Owner-PC and another one… my xbox. the server is going to be hosted on 192.168.2.2…
that is the Ip you will use in the Virtual servers tab I described earlier

Read full topic

and his lan ip address

Read full topic

item.title: I need a belkin portfowarder
item.dc:creator: @gamerbug gamerbug
item.description:
@gamerbug wrote:

it’s just like a linux… you go to firewall-virtual private server-and when your there, justadd YOUR computers LAN Ip address that your going to host it on, and sett the ports to 43594-43594, set protocal to TCP and check enable and click set. your done.

Read full topic
